summary: What would angry Harry be like? I love when you do these types of things because they seem so spot on! Thank you ☺️❤️
question: What would angry Harry be like? I love when you do these types of things because they seem so spot on! Thank you ☺️❤️
answer:
Hi my lovey! Awe thank you I’m glad you enjoy these! Hope you like this, it’s always kinda hard for me to imagine Harry being truly angry but I tried 🙈💖

Harry has different stages of being mad, the one you seem to see the most is just him being a bit annoyed. Where he just rolls his eyes a lot and folds his arms across his chest, gives you this look that’s not a full on pout or glare but a mixture of the two that lets you know he’s on the edge of annoyed and extremely irritated. You’ll know when he’s in this mood by the sort of groan that leaves him before he lets out a huff and tosses the empty milk carton into the trash and that’s when you realize you forgot to get more and there wasn’t enough for his morning smoothie. It’s little things such as that that seem to annoy him but you normally can fix this mood with a few kisses to his pouty face and a hug from behind as you swear you’ll go to the store right after your morning shower.

When Harry is upset he is quiet at first, he doesn’t want to discuss it right in that moment because he doesn’t want to say anything that will push either of you down deeper into your feelings. He just takes a few minutes to gather his thoughts and take a few deep breaths, you’ll see him pinch at the bridge of his nose before letting out a breath through it while his hands land on his hips as he closes his eyes and looks up towards the ceiling. You only see this side of Harry when something truly worth discussing happens, like when he tells you to do something that is for your best interests and you just blatantly do the opposite much like the time you ignored his request for you to use his driver and just walked to the venue to meet him before one of his shows and you got bombarded by fans and photographers. Most of the time this results in you getting teary eyed because you never truly intend to make him upset with you, and Harry’s shoulder slumping and a sigh escaping him as he just brings you into his chest and your mumbled apology gets lost in the fabric of his shirt while he just shushes you with a kiss to your forehead.

Harry rarely ever gets to the point where he’s so mad he can’t control himself and just ends up shouting whatever comes to his mind in the heat of the moment. His jaw is clenched, one of his hands running through his hair and tugging at the roots while the other is on his hip and his eyes are burning a hole into the back of your head. This side of Harry only gets shown when he has just reached his limit and often it’s set off by something little but deep down he’s been holding this in for a while, most of the time what he’s truly upset about has little to nothing to do with you. He knows that he’s overreacting but in the moment he couldn’t care less, this normally occurs when the two of you get home from a party that you just so happen to know quite a few people at and Harry’s never been one to share easily so the fact you only spent maybe ten minutes with him the whole time the two of you were there just doesn’t sit well with him. He throws out accusing statements making you roll your eyes as you head into the bedroom to get ready for bed, this only adds to Harry’s anger making him storm after you. You know that by the time you get out of the bath and into your comfy nighty that he will be sitting on the edge of the bed with his head in his hands and when you walk over to stand in front of him all he will do is wrap his arms around your middle and rest his forehead against your tummy, you’ll run your hands through his hair as you lea down to kiss his head while he begins his apology and lets you in on what’s really been going on through that head of his. 💖

summary: My New Story
title: My New Story
body:
Hi!

Some of you have shown interest in my writing (which makes my little heart wanna beat right out of my chest) 😊 So I thought I’d post a little tiny bit of what I have of a new story.

It’s just a little, but let me know what you think!



Honey Summer

It was a small, desolate town on the outskirts of New York. It didn’t look like New York, not the bright city on steroids with saturated colors and cringe-y accents like the movies. It looked like it belonged in the Midwest; where only the people dragged in knew of its existence. Where time creeps along at a snail’s pace, only to look back at your life and realize you never quite had one, and wonder how it was possible for time to fly so fast when you never even had a dream. 


It was the middle of May. And Harry would like to say it was the summer after high school, and he was going to enjoy his last few months before going to college, where he’d struggle picking a major until a quirky professor pointed out a hidden talent he could pursue. He’d like to be telling people about the scholarship he’d received, and the dorm he’d move into. He’d talk of the girl he left behind because she was moving out to California to be an actress, and then at Thanksgiving he’d have someone pretty on his arm who’d flip his world around. 

But that’s not quite how his story goes.

summary: what if y/n forgot to take her birth control so her and harry have to use a condom but since they never use them they don’t have...
question: what if y/n forgot to take her birth control so her and harry have to use a condom but since they never use them they don’t have them around the house so they have to stop in the middle of everything and go to the store all flustered 😫
answer:
“Oh god, you can’t be serious,” he mumbles, covering his face with his hands as he realise what this means. “Sorry babe,” you chuckle, finding it a bit amusing but also annoying, “we gotta run to the store.” 

He groans, already hating the fact that he has to use a condom, but to make it worse you don’t even have one around, so now he’s left with a stiffy and nothing to do about it.

“We gotta be quick then,” he finally says, knowing there’s nothing else to do. “Don’t want anyone to see me with a hard on,” he chuckles before getting out of bed and grabbing his boxers from the floor, “and I really need to fuck you.”

The last statement makes you laugh, knowing you’re just as annoyed and horny as him, mentally kicking yourself for forgetting to take your pill. You’re both quick to throw your clothes back on, rushing down to the store further down the street. 

Harry pulls his the hood of his hoodie on before entering the store, holding onto your hand tightly as he pulls you toward the isle that he knows contains the condoms. “I bloody hate these,” he mumbles to himself as he looks through the different brands, flavours and sizes. 

He had been trilled when you decided to ditch condoms and start on the pill instead, hating the fact that condoms prevented him to feel all of you. “I’d rather fuck you bare,” he chuckles as he finally decides on a pack to get, “feel all of you on my cock.”

“Harry!” you swat his arm which only makes him laugh, not really minding the statement as you feel the same way, but you’d rather not have the cashier hear you.

You watch Harry fumble with the pack as he rushes over to the checkout, almost dropping it on the floor. He adjusts himself in his boxers as he pays, the bugle visible in his grey sweats. The man behind the counter gives the two of you a glance, thankfully not recognising Harry, but seeing both of your messy hair and flushed cheeks, knowing very well what have happened.

“Come on babe,” Harry says as he grabs the pack of condoms again and take your hand, desperately rushing back to your apartment. “Gonna make sure you won’t be able to walk tomorrow,” he smirks, his cock throbbing in his tight boxers, not remembering the last time he had been this desperate.

summary: Just Breathe
title: Just Breathe
body:
Chapter Six

“Harry, are you trying to dress your daughter like a nun or is it just coming naturally?”Harry turned to the woman next to him who wore a cheeky grin while he held an outfit for Arya in his hands….

Read more…

summary: My aesthetic is Louis emerging from behind Harry in the 'Drag Me Down' music video and them hugging at the end of the last show...

summary: The Baby on Tour
title: The Baby on Tour
body:
one night of love and i got my place on the tour bus

Who the Nurse?

*Louis POV* “Are comfortable?” I hear an unfamiliar voice talking “Very thank you” Claire responds “We have rooms down stairs for dads to sleep in if he would like” the voice speaks again “Good luck…

Read more…
